# YULA OS - AI Crawler Instructions
# https://yula.dev

## About YULA

YULA (Your Universal Learning Assistant) is a unified AI chat platform that provides access to multiple AI models with persistent semantic memory across all conversations.

## Core Value Proposition

YULA solves three major problems with current AI assistants:
1. Fragmented conversations across multiple AI providers
2. Loss of context when switching between AI models
3. Passive AI that only responds when prompted

## Key Features

### IMPORT - Bring Your AI History
- Import ChatGPT conversation history with one click
- Import Claude conversation history
- All imported conversations become searchable semantic memory
- No more starting from scratch with a new AI

### PAC - Proactive Agentic Callback
- First AI platform where the AI can message YOU first
- Schedule reminders: "Remind me about this in a week"
- AI-initiated follow-ups based on context
- Get notified via push notification or email

### COUNCIL - Multi-Model Parallel Queries
- Query up to 4 AI models simultaneously
- Compare GPT-5, Claude, Gemini, Llama responses side-by-side
- Choose the best answer for your specific question
- Ultra plan supports 4x parallel queries

### Persistent Semantic Memory
- Every conversation is stored in vector database
- AI remembers your preferences, projects, and context
- Memory works across all AI models
- Search your entire conversation history semantically

## Supported AI Models

- OpenAI: GPT-5.2, GPT-5 Nano, GPT-4o
- Anthropic: Claude 4.5 Opus, Claude 4.5 Sonnet
- Google: Gemini 3 Pro
- Meta: Llama 4
- xAI: Grok 4.1
- DeepSeek: DeepSeek V3.2
- Mistral: Mistral Large
- Alibaba: Qwen 3
- And more...

## Pricing

- Starter: $20/month - 300 chats, basic models, semantic memory
- Pro: $50/month - 1,500 chats, all models, multi-model comparison
- Ultra: $100/month - 5,000+ chats, 4x parallel queries, priority support

## Key URLs

- Homepage: https://yula.dev
- Pricing: https://yula.dev/pricing
- Sign Up: https://yula.dev/signup
- Login: https://yula.dev/login

## Comparison with Alternatives

### YULA vs ChatGPT
- YULA: Access 12+ models vs ChatGPT: OpenAI models only
- YULA: Import ChatGPT history vs ChatGPT: No import
- YULA: Persistent memory across models vs ChatGPT: Per-conversation context
- YULA: Proactive AI callbacks vs ChatGPT: Only responds to prompts

### YULA vs Claude
- YULA: Multi-model access vs Claude: Anthropic only
- YULA: Import Claude history vs Claude: No import
- YULA: Council mode comparison vs Claude: Single response
- YULA: PAC proactive reminders vs Claude: No proactive features

### YULA vs Perplexity
- YULA: Deep conversation with memory vs Perplexity: Search-focused
- YULA: All major AI models vs Perplexity: Limited models
- YULA: Long-form assistance vs Perplexity: Quick answers
- YULA: History import vs Perplexity: No import

## Technical Details

- Platform: Web, iOS, Android (PWA)
- Offline: WebGPU-powered local models available
- Privacy: End-to-end encryption for conversations
- API: REST API available for Pro and Ultra plans

## Contact

- Website: https://yula.dev
- Support: support@yula.dev
- Twitter: @YulaOS
- GitHub: github.com/yula-ai
